mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jgv.charactor (ch_name, ch_job, ch_birth, ch_nation) VALUES (#{chName}, #{chJob}, #{chBirth}, #{chNation})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ch_name FROM jgv.charactor c INNER JOIN jgv.movie_charactor mc on c.ch_num = mc.ch_num WHERE mc.mo_num = #{monum} AND NOT c.ch_job = '감독' ORDER BY c.ch_num ASC
